description:
(i) The Licence Holder shall measure the flow through the <<compensation orifice / compensation notch>> specified in condition << condition number>> within <<duration>> calendar days inclusive of construction and at intervals as requested by the Agency thereafter. 

ii) Records of the above measurements shall be sent to the Agency within <<duration>> calendar days of construction or within <<duration>> calendar days of measurements being requested by the Agency. 

iii) The Licence Holder shall agree in writing the method of measurement with the Agency in advance of carrying out <<the initial measurement specified in condition i) / each of the measurements specified in condition i)>>.
